comment.body:
What are those bullshit statistics you're quoting here?
The US gives around 3 billion dollar a year to Israel's defense, and if you didn't know, the way the aid works is that the US only gives Israel money if they will use it to buy American made weapons. meaning all the money goes back to the US and creates jobs on the way.

The average household income in Israel is around 4000$.

The US YEARLY budget (the strongest country in the world financly) is around 4 trillion $. do you really believe they gave Israel a trillion dollars?

But good things you didn't threat to kill anyone over bullshit statistics.
just don't go bombing people in the white house of rumors that even a quick google search, or basic finance knowledge would prove wrong.

#fuck people who makes assumptions from rumors.

#fuck anti-semits
Decentralized, opensource, and free social networks will slowly do their work to wake everyone up and remove Facebook and other corporated social networks off the face of the internet.
